item.title: Despite Trump’s Words, China and Russia Are Not Threatening Greenland - The New York Times
item.description: Despite Trump’s Words, China and Russia Are Not Threatening Greenland The New York TimesTrump says China is a threat to Greenland. What’s Beijing doing in the Arctic? The Washington PostRussian and Chinese Threats to Greenland and the New Arctic Sea Routes Are Low U.S. Naval InstituteIs China a threat to Greenland? Global TimesIs Greenland really in danger of being overrun by Russia and China? The Times
